results.name: Dirichlet g.f.: zeta(s) * zeta(s-1) * Product_{p prime} (1 + p^(1 - s) - p^(-s)).
comment: Dirichlet convolution of A000203 with abs(A097945).
link: Vaclav Kotesovec, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Vaclav Kotesovec, Graph - the asymptotic ratio (1000000 terms)
formula: Dirichlet g.f.: zeta(s) * zeta(s-1)^2 / zeta(2*s-2) * Product_{primes p} (1 - 1/(p^s + p)).
Dirichlet g.f.: zeta(s) * zeta(s-1)^2 * Product_{primes p} (1 + p^(1-2*s) - p^(2-2*s) - p^(-s)).
program: (PARI) for(n=1, 100, print1(direuler(p=2, n, (1 + p*X - X)/(1 - X)/(1 - p*X))[n], ", "))
(PARI) for(n=1, 100, print1(direuler(p=2, n, (1 + p*X/(1 - X))/(1 - p*X))[n], ", "))
results.author: _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jun 20 2020
